title: ðŸ“¬ Mailbag: Smokescreen for the 49ers at #3? Are we too harsh on Tua? Dream all-time Super Bowl matchup? (Football 4/16)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson and John Breech to answer questions from the Pick Six mailbag. The guys first discuss the 49ers thought process at #3 and why Mac Jones shouldn't be considered a lock in that spot. Hello, Justin Fields! The Pick Six Superfriends then address if we've been too harsh collectively on Tua Tagovailoa after a disappointing rookie season under some tough circumstances. If you could pick 2 teams ever to play in the Super Bowl, who would they be? Wilson goes for the winless Lions vs. the winless Browns. Who will have the better pro career: Kyle Pitts or Ja'Marr Chase?Could we see a team permanently based in the UK? All those questions answered and more on the mailbag.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/

Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson and John Breech to answer questions from the Pick Six mailbag. The guys first discuss the 49ers thought process at #3 and why Mac Jones shouldn't be considered a lock in that spot. Hello, Justin Fields! The Pick Six Superfriends then address if we've been too harsh collectively on Tua Tagovailoa after a disappointing rookie season under some tough circumstances. If you could pick 2 teams ever to play in the Super Bowl, who would they be? Wilson goes for the winless Lions vs. the winless Browns. Who will have the better pro career: Kyle Pitts or Ja'Marr Chase?Could we see a team permanently based in the UK? All those questions answered and more on the mailbag.
